author: saya
msg: Test for merging updates to an entry from the txn log. This kind of merge is used to get a transactionally consistent view of an entry.
Also added txnconflict test to check if conflicts on Dn space can be detected. This kind of check is done during commit time.
Fixes and documentation based on the above two tests.

author: shv
msg: HDFS-2002. Incorrect computation of needed blocks in getTurnOffTip(). Contributed by Plamen Jeliazkov.
